Visibility: 9.7 km

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
